title.rendered: Ten Hag off to a perfect start as United trounce Liverpool 4-0 on tour

content.rendered:
Thailand tour proved successful for Ten Hag. He off to a perfect start as Manchester United trounce Liverpool with 4-0 on tour on Tuesday. Hag, the new manager of UMFC got a big boost in his first match inchargeship.

           Liverpool, one of the successful Football Club of the England looked jaded and on the back foot for much of the match against a United side with superior fitness who capitalized on a slew of first half errors in Bangkok with three goals in the space of 21 thrilling minutes. In–spite of this Liverpool lost the match finally.

          The final result of the match unlikely to trouble the LPFC. The United FC players performed brilliantly for winning with strategic point of view. Jadon  Sancho, Fred, Anthony Martial and Facundo P., all were played pivotal role in United’s winning as they were playing against their biggest rival. United manager Ten Hag praised all.

“All of United star have shown their storming form after a few minutes of starting match. Earlier it seems that Liverpool will give tough challenge, but they surrender easily before their sprit.”

“We have to not overestimate this result, we have to be careful, but still I’ve seen some really good things…we have the potential to do a lot of creativity and speed play during the match. The result indicates toward.”

United made many changes at halftime of match after which Liverpool emerged better organized, with chances from their 75 million euros ($75.42 million) striker Darwin Nunez and Mohamed Salah(Forward and right wing player), who was frustrated late on by  De Gea and the woodwork.

The Hag managed team, United FC completed the demolition  with 14th minutes left. Pellistri latching onto an Eric Bailey pass on the counter and converting with ease after a one-two with Amad Diallo.

Read more: 100 Percent Prepare for UEFA Champions League: Manisha Kalyan
